GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for specified article

comments.body: This is a bad article name
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a new comment for selected article, returning new comment
